item.title: Conferences
item.description: Technical Talks A New Life For An Old Phone Cognizant Softvision Programmers Week Romania, September 2022 Droidcon Lisbon, April 2022 Code Review A Software Engineer’s Best Friend - Link to Talk Droidcon London, October 2021 DroidconAPAC, December 2020 GDG DevFest Italia, November 2020 DroidconEMEA, October 2020 DC Android Meetup, July 2020 Journal Articles Katerina Goseva-Popstojanova and Goce Anastasovski “Characterization and classification of malicious Web traffic” In: Journal of Computer & Security Conference Proceedings Goce Anastasovski and Katerina Goseva-Popstojanova “Classification of Partially Labeled Malicious Web Traffic in the Presence of Concept Drift” In: The IEEE 8th International Conference on Software Security and Reliability-Companion (SERE-C), San Francisco, USA, June 30 - July 2, 2014 CA, USA: International Institute of Informatics and Systemics

item.title: About
item.description: Hey everyone, thank you for visiting my page. My name is Goce I am an Engineering Manager at Alarm.com where I currently lead several teams of iOS and Android engineers. After several years working on an app that lets you control IoT devices I took a break and spent some time working in FinTech as a team lead at Capital One. In my free time, I am either working on side projects or conference talks.
